posts.post_content: FS: asking $old paypal F&F or money orders. If you are interested please email me at [url]jsimas@sbcglobal.net[/url]. Please add $4 for shipping. Sale Pending Thanks

Not sure if I should post this here or in the "missed opportunity" thread, but dad bought this card out of a stack of unprotected cards one summer when we were in Lake George.  Mid 80s.  Dad saw Gandil and bought it.  I sort of neglected the card over the years, but it has grown on me.  The set has really grown on me as I am about to attempt at completing this little set.

Wonderful card.  Thanks for posting it here.

I thought I would post a thank you to Joey for a flawless transaction on the BST.  I know there have been a few troubling transactions lately mentioned on the main page in recent days, but thanks to Leon and the other moderators, almost all BST transactions are perfect.
Anyways, thanks for the wonderful Gandil, a card I owned years ago and am so happy to have back.....and thanks for excepting a good ole fashioned money order!
Tim Kindler
